org.archive.net

类 UURIFactoryTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.archive.net.UURIFactoryTest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class UURIFactoryTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Test UURIFactory for proper UURI creation across variety of important/tricky cases. Be careful writing this file. Make sure you write it with UTF-8 encoding.

    • 构造器概要

      • testRFC3986Relative

        public final void testRFC3986Relative()
                               throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException
        Tests from rfc3986 
               "g:h"           =  "g:h"
       "g"             =  "http://a/b/c/g"
       "./g"           =  "http://a/b/c/g"
       "g/"            =  "http://a/b/c/g/"
       "/g"            =  "http://a/g"
       "//g"           =  "http://g"
       "?y"            =  "http://a/b/c/d;p?y"
       "g?y"           =  "http://a/b/c/g?y"
       "#s"            =  "http://a/b/c/d;p?q#s"
       "g#s"           =  "http://a/b/c/g#s"
       "g?y#s"         =  "http://a/b/c/g?y#s"
       ";x"            =  "http://a/b/c/;x"
       "g;x"           =  "http://a/b/c/g;x"
       "g;x?y#s"       =  "http://a/b/c/g;x?y#s"
       ""              =  "http://a/b/c/d;p?q"
       "."             =  "http://a/b/c/"
       "./"            =  "http://a/b/c/"
       ".."            =  "http://a/b/"
       "../"           =  "http://a/b/"
       "../g"          =  "http://a/b/g"
       "../.."         =  "http://a/"
       "../../"        =  "http://a/"
       "../../g"       =  "http://a/g"
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException

      • tryRelative

        protected void tryRelative(UURI base,
               java.lang.String relative,
               java.lang.String expected)
                    throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException

      • testRFC2396Relative

        public final void testRFC2396Relative()
                               throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException
        Tests from rfc2396 with amendments to accomodate differences intentionally added to make our URI handling like IEs. 
               g:h           =  g:h
       g             =  http://a/b/c/g
       ./g           =  http://a/b/c/g
       g/            =  http://a/b/c/g/
       /g            =  http://a/g
       //g           =  http://g
       ?y            =  http://a/b/c/?y
       g?y           =  http://a/b/c/g?y
       #s            =  (current document)#s
       g#s           =  http://a/b/c/g#s
       g?y#s         =  http://a/b/c/g?y#s
       ;x            =  http://a/b/c/;x
       g;x           =  http://a/b/c/g;x
       g;x?y#s       =  http://a/b/c/g;x?y#s
       .             =  http://a/b/c/
       ./            =  http://a/b/c/
       ..            =  http://a/b/
       ../           =  http://a/b/
       ../g          =  http://a/b/g
       ../..         =  http://a/
       ../../        =  http://a/
       ../../g       =  http://a/g
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException

      • testAnchors

        public final void testAnchors()
                       throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException
        A UURI should always be without a 'fragment' segment, which is unused and irrelevant for network fetches. See [ 970666 ] #anchor links not trimmed, and thus recrawled
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException

        public void testStartsWithColon()

        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException
